| History                 = The Latverian New Prosperity Alliance was a radical [[Latveria|Latverian]] politcal group who fought against the the opposing conservative faction known as [[Doom's Children (Earth-616)|Doom's Children]] during the civil war that plagued the small European country following [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Doctor Doom]]'s abdication of the throne.

[[United States of America|US]] Presidential candidate [[Loki Laufeyson (Ikol) (Earth-616)|Loki]] infiltrated the Prosperity Alliance and facilitated them access to a secret weapons cache in [[Castle Doom (Doomstadt)|Castle Doom]]. The ensuing confrontation between the members of the Prosperity Alliance and its opposition resulted in an explosion that killed Doom's Children leader [[Octavio von Bardas (Earth-616)|Octavio von Bardas]].{{r|Vote Loki Vol 1 3}}
